test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(max(()))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3)) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((3, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 3)) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((3, 1, 5, 1, 1, 3)) eq 5`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((3, -5.0, 5, 1, -3, 3)) eq 5`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((xs:untypedAtomic("3"), 1, 2)) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqMAXFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `max((1, xs:float(2), xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) eq 3`.
